meanings.definition: A type of ancient temple tower in Mesopotamia.
meanings.sent1: The zikkurats were built with mud bricks.
meanings.sent2: Archaeologists discovered many zikkurats in the region.
meanings.sent3: The zikkurats in Mesopotamia must have been great lookout spots!
meanings.sent4: The zikkurats stood tall like guardians of the ancient city.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the zikkurats felt like stepping back in time.

meanings.definition: The plural form of zikkurat, referring to multiple ancient temple towers in Mesopotamia.
meanings.sent1: We learned about the zikkurats in history class.
meanings.sent2: The tour guide pointed out the zikkurats on the horizon.
meanings.sent3: The zikkurats looked like giant staircases to the sky!
meanings.sent4: The zikkurats dotted the landscape like ancient sentinels.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the zikkurats was breathtaking.
